keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: Serve with oven chips.

method.text: Thread one cube of cod onto skewers (one skewer per person).
Fold each piece of bacon in half then thread onto the skewers alternating with the cod and cherry tomatoes ending with a piece of bacon.
Place the butter in a small pan and heat gently until melted. Stir in sage and seasoning. Brush over kebabs. Grill gently for 8-10 min until bacon is cooked and fish flakes easily.

title: Cod and bacon kebabs
